net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO

Class BaseByteTextReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.AbstractByteReader
      • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.BaseByteTextReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IByteReader, IByteRecordReader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ByteTextReader, CsvByteReader

    public abstract class BaseByteTextReader
extends AbstractByteReader
    Reads a standard Text file (like standard readLine of Class BufferedReader) except it will return an Array of Bytes (instead of a String). This allows binary data to be in a line (i.e. using X'FF' as a field Separator). It has a limit of 256kb on the line size.
    Version:
    0.68
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
